Name: İfrit
About the game: !!IMPORTANT WARNING!! It is recommended to set the game resolution to a maximum of 1920x1080. Please do not exceed the resolution setting for a good gaming experience. About this game Ifrit is a first-person single-player psychological horror game with a story. WARNING: This game can trigger seizures from people with photosensitive epilepsy. It is left to the discretion of the player. IMPORTANT NOTE: The game focuses on exploration and you have to search your surroundings thoroughly in order to progress in the game. Ifrit is a first-person psychological horror game. Environment The story of the game takes place in a house in Çıkrık village of Corum, a city in Turkey. The subject of the game An old woman in Çıkrık village of Çorum is very upset that she has not had a child for a long time. Despite trying every way to have a child, the old woman who still cannot have a child starts to look for the cure in magic. The woman who makes magic talismans and distributes them to every room of the house gets her in trouble with the demons instead of having children as a result of this work. The purpose of the game Save the old woman from this situation by going to the old woman's house and finding and eliminating the 4 amulets hidden in the house. Genie Aid Our main character, Mehmet Hodja, Hz. By turning the seal of Solomon (a.s) into a ring and enchanting it, he is able to communicate with the jinn who are Muslims. Thanks to this ring, Muslim jinn protect Mehmet Hodja from the evils around him and inform him by whispering in his ear if there is a spell or a calamity in his place. In order to use this power in the game, you can find the Qurans in some rooms and take them to different rooms where you feel that something is happening and use this power.
